description: Casual, slip-on footwear with Cushion Bounce shaped footbeds that provide anatomic arch support. Perfect for every day of summer.Full-grain leather upper with soft padded jersey lining.High-energy cushion footbed for comfort in each step.Anatomically contoured midsole with arch support and heel cupping for added comfort.High-density rubber sponge outsole for durable traction.
name: Reef Cushion Bounce Phantom LE Flips - Men's
